alert.note: Alert for Newaygo (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 10:20AM EDT until April 07 at 4:24AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Muskegon River at Bridgeton affecting Newaygo County. For the Muskegon River...including Evart, Croton, Newaygo, Bridgeton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Muskegon River at Bridgeton. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flood water begins surrounding cottages and homes downstream from the City of Newaygo in the areas of Leisure Land Subdivision in Bridgeton Township. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 13.9 feet Monday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.0 feet on 02/05/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/grr.
